name: Server Documentation
changelog:
## v1.1.0-beta2

### New Features
- **JSON Export/Import**: Full backup and restore of documents with all configuration
- **Non-destructive migrations**: Documents are preserved when uninstalling the plugin
- **Update support**: Plugin can now check for and install updates

### v1.1.0-beta Features
- **Three editor modes**: Rich Text, Markdown, and Raw HTML
- **Content conversion**: Automatically convert content between editor types
- **Template variables**: Use {{user.name}}, {{server.name}}, etc. in documents
